weapons.name: Sniper Rifle
weapons.rule: This weapon can target a CHARACTER model even if it is not the closest enemy model. Wound rolls of 6+ inflict an additional mortal wound.

weapons.name: Bolt Sniper Rifle
weapons.rule: This weapon can target a CHARACTER model even if it is not the closest enemy model. Choose one of the profiles below when firing this weapon:

multiProfiles.name: Mortis Round
multiProfiles.rule: Wound rolls of 6+ inflict an additional mortal wound.

multiProfiles.name: Executioner Round
multiProfiles.rule: This weapon can target models that are not visible to the bearer. Targets saving throws do not benefit from cover. Add +2 to hit when firing this weapon

weapons.name: Shock Grenades
weapons.rule: If an enemy INFANTRY model is hit by this, it cannot fire Overwatch and must subtract 1 from any hit rolls model.

weapons.name: Volkite Blaster
weapons.rule: Wound rolls of 6+ cause an additional mortal wound.

weapons.name: Corvus Hammer
weapons.rule: Each wound roll of 6+ causes D3 damage.

weapons.name: Arc Claw
weapons.rule: When attacking a VEHICLE, this weapon has a Damage of D3.

weapons.name: Penitent Eviscerator
weapons.rule: Subtract 1 from the to hit roll when attacking with this.

weapons.name: Halberd of Caliban
weapons.rule: Make an additional D3 attacks if the target unit contains 5 or more models.

weapons.name: Combat Knife
weapons.rule: Gain +1 attack with this weapon.

weapons.name: Chainsword
weapons.rule: Gain +1 attack with this weapon.

weapons.name: Power Fist
weapons.rule: Subtract 1 from the to hit roll when attacking with this.

weapons.name: Servo-Arm
weapons.rule: This weapon can only be used for 1 attack at a time. Subtract 1 from the to hit roll when attacking with this.

weapons.name: Inferno Pistol
weapons.rule: Roll two D6 for damage on targets withing half range. Discard the lower result.

weapons.name: Cognis Flamer
weapons.rule: This weapon hits automatically. When firing Overwatch, roll two dice for the amount of attacks and discard the lowest.

weapons.name: Flamer
weapons.rule: This weapon hits automatically.

weapons.name: Hand Flamer
weapons.rule: This weapon hits automatically.

weapons.name: Heavy Arc Rifle
weapons.rule: When attacking a VEHICLE, this weapon has a Damage of D6.

weapons.name: Bike with Plasma Talon
weapons.rule: When firing this weapon, choose one of the profiles below.

multiProfiles.name: Supercharge
multiProfiles.rule: On a hit roll of 1, the bearer is slain (after attack is resolved)

weapons.name: Astartes Shotgun
weapons.rule: Add +1 Strength if the target is within half range.

weapons.name: Combi-Plasma
weapons.rule: Choose one or two of the profiles below. If you choose both, subtract 1 from all hit rolls for this weapon.

multiProfiles.name: Plasma Gun
multiProfiles.rule: When firing this weapon, choose one of the profiles below.

multiProfiles.name: Supercharge
multiProfiles.rule: On a hit roll of 1, the bearer is slain (after attack is resolved)

multiProfiles.name: Melee
multiProfiles.rule: Subtract 1 from the to hit roll when attacking with this.

multiProfiles.name: Melee
multiProfiles.rule: Subtract 1 from the to hit roll when attacking with this.

multiProfiles.name: Melee
multiProfiles.rule: Subtract 1 from the to hit roll when attacking with this.

weapons.name: Plasma Incinerator
weapons.rule: When firing this weapon, choose one of the profiles below.

multiProfiles.name: Supercharge
multiProfiles.rule: On a hit roll of 1, the bearer is slain (after attack is resolved)

weapons.name: Assault Plasma Incinerator
weapons.rule: When firing this weapon, choose one of the profiles below.

multiProfiles.name: Supercharge
multiProfiles.rule: On a hit roll of 1, the bearer is slain (after attack is resolved)

weapons.name: Heavy Plasma Incinerator
weapons.rule: When firing this weapon, choose one of the profiles below.

multiProfiles.name: Supercharge
multiProfiles.rule: On a hit roll of 1, the bearer is slain (after attack is resolved)

weapons.name: Marksman Bolt Carbine
weapons.rule: On a hit roll of 6, the weapon automatically wounds the target

weapons.name: Markerlight
weapons.rule: See Markerlight table

weapons.name: Photon grenade
weapons.rule: Your opponent must subtract 1 from any hit rolls made for INFANTRY units that were hit by this weapon until the end of the turn.

weapons.name: Heavy Rail Rifle
weapons.rule: Each time you make a wound roll of 6+ for this weapon, the target unit suffers a mortal wound in addition to the normal damage.

weapons.name: Airbursting Fragmentation Projector
weapons.rule: This weapon can target units that are not visible to the bearer.

weapons.name: Cyclic Ion Blaster
weapons.rule: When firing this weapon, choose one of the profiles below.

multiProfiles.name: Overcharge
multiProfiles.rule: On a hit roll of 1, the bearer is slain (after attack is resolved)

weapons.name: Fusion blaster
weapons.rule: Roll two D6 for damage on targets withing half range. Discard the lower result.

weapons.name: Missile Launcher
weapons.rule: When firing this weapon, choose one of the profiles below.

weapons.name: Multi-melta
weapons.rule: Roll two D6 for damage on targets withing half range. Discard the lower result.

weapons.name: Grav-pistol
weapons.rule: Inflicts D3 damage instead of 1 if the target has a save roll of 3+ or better

weapons.name: Grav-gun
weapons.rule: Inflicts D3 damage instead of 1 if the target has a save roll of 3+ or better

weapons.name: Pulse Blaster
weapons.rule: When firing this weapon, choose one of the profiles below.

weapons.name: Ion Rifle
weapons.rule: When firing this weapon, choose one of the profiles below.

multiProfiles.name: Overcharge
multiProfiles.rule: On a hit roll of 1, the bearer is slain (after attack is resolved)

weapons.name: Rail Rifle
weapons.rule: Wound rolls of 6+ cause an additional mortal wound.

weapons.name: Rail Carbine
weapons.rule: Wound rolls of 6+ cause an additional mortal wound.

weapons.name: Kodachi
weapons.rule: Wound rolls of 6+ are resolved at AP 4 and Damage 2.

weapons.name: Shard
weapons.rule: This weapon never requires more than 3+ to hit.

weapons.name: Widowmaker
weapons.rule: This weapon hits automatically.

weapons.name: Lucia's Curtana
weapons.rule: Once per mission, invoke a single Act of Faith that affects the bearer. This does not count against the number of Acts of Faith you have used this phase.

otherEquipment.name: Tartaros Armour
otherEquipment.effect: This model has a 5+ invulnerable save.

otherEquipment.name: Storm Shield
otherEquipment.effect: This model has a 3+ invulnerable save.

otherEquipment.name: Sniper Training
otherEquipment.effect: (Team Leader only) When this model remained stationary, re-roll 'To Hit' rolls of 1.

otherEquipment.name: Compact Stimulant Injector
otherEquipment.effect: (Team Leader only) Roll a dice each time this model suffers a wound, on a roll of 6 ignore it.

otherEquipment.name: Stabilizing Jet
otherEquipment.effect: (Jet Pack only) +2” when advancing

otherEquipment.name: Tartaros Armour
otherEquipment.effect: This model has a 5+ invulnerable save.

otherEquipment.name: Medicae Mechadendrite
otherEquipment.effect: At the end of your Movement phase, this model can attempt to heal a model or revive a single model. Nominate a model who was killed in the previous turn and was within 3” of the healing models’ current position, on a 4+ the model is revived with 1 wound remaining. After attempting the revive the equipped model must skip it actions for all other phases this turn. Alternatively, select a wounded model within 3”. That model immediately regains 1 wound.

otherEquipment.name: Ballistic Mechadendrite
otherEquipment.effect: The bearer may purchase an additional weapon from the Pistols or Magos Special weapons list which is fired with a -1 to BS. This upgrade may be taken twice by the same model.

otherEquipment.name: Heavy Armature Legs
otherEquipment.effect: This model never suffers the penalty for moving and firing heavy weapons and cannot be moved by enemy models. If the equipped model advances its must always advance by D3”.

otherEquipment.name: Marksman Honour
otherEquipment.effect: (Shas'ui only) Grants the model an additional attack with one of its ranged weapons each shooting phase.

otherEquipment.name: Hardwired Support System
otherEquipment.effect: (Battlesuit only) The model may take an item from the Support Systems list, increasing it’s cost by 50% rounding up. Advanced Targeting System and Shield Generator’s cost is doubled instead.

otherEquipment.name: Iridium Armour
otherEquipment.effect: (Crisis only) This model has a 2+ armour save.

otherEquipment.name: Blacksun Visor
otherEquipment.effect: Ignore negative modifiers to hit rolls in the shooting phase that result from any special rules the target model has.

otherEquipment.name: Jump Pack
otherEquipment.effect: Increase this models movement to 12” and gain the Jump Pack and Fly keywords.

otherEquipment.name: Advanced targeting system
otherEquipment.effect: Increase the AP characteristic of all weapons by 1.

otherEquipment.name: Counterfire defence system
otherEquipment.effect: May re-rolls failed hit rolls when firing Overwatch.

otherEquipment.name: Drone controller
otherEquipment.effect: <SEPT> Drones within 6” gain +1 to hit.

otherEquipment.name: Extended Drone Controller
otherEquipment.effect: Gun Drones or Marker Drones within 12”gain +1 to hit.

otherEquipment.name: Early warning override
otherEquipment.effect: If any enemy model are set up within 12” as the result of an ability that allows them to arrive mid-battle, then at the end of that phase you may shoot at one of those models as if it were your Shooting phase, but you must subtract 1 from hit rolls when resolving these shots.

otherEquipment.name: Multi-tracker
otherEquipment.effect: Re-roll hit rolls of 1 in the Shooting phase if it fires all of its weapons at the same target and that target contains 5 or more models.

otherEquipment.name: Shield generator
otherEquipment.effect: This model has a 4+ invulnerable save.

otherEquipment.name: Hard-Wired Light Shield
otherEquipment.effect: (Team Leader only) This model has a 5+ invulnerable save.

otherEquipment.name: Command Node
otherEquipment.effect: (Team Leader only) Increases the models Inspiring Presence radius to 12”.

otherEquipment.name: XV05 Armour
otherEquipment.effect: (Team Leader only) This model has a 3+ armour save.

otherEquipment.name: Target lock
otherEquipment.effect: Does not not suffer the penalty for moving and firing Heavy weapons, or for Advancing and firing Assault weapons. May also Advance and fire Rapid Fire weapons (at -1 to hit)

otherEquipment.name: Velocity tracker
otherEquipment.effect: Gain +1 to hit when it shooting at a target that can FLY.
